pages.text: 95|1|Ichijiku to orību ni oite,
95|2|shinaizan ni oite,
95|3|mata heian'na kono machi ni oite (chikau).
95|4|Hontōni ware wa, ningen o mottomo utsukushī sugata ni tsukutta.
95|5|Sorekara ware wa, kare o mottomo hikuku sageta.
95|6|Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni taishite wa hateshinai hōshō ga arou.
95|7|Naze sore demo, omae wa shūkyō (shinjitsu) o hitei suru no ka.
95|8|Arrā wa, mottomo sugureta shinpan-shade wanai ka.
96|1|Yome,`sōzō nasa reru okata, anata no omo no o nanioite.
96|2|Ichi gyōketsu kara, ningen o tsukura reta.'
96|3|Yome,`anata no omo wa, saikō no sonki de arare,
96|4|-hitsu ni yotte (kaku koto o) oshie rareta okata.
96|5|Ningen ni michi naru koto o oshie rareta okatadearu.'
96|6|Iya, ningen wa hontōni hōgaide,
96|7|jibun de nani mo tarinai tokoro wa nai to kangaete iru.
96|8|Hontōni anata no omo ni (subete no mono wa) kisa reru nodearu.
96|9|Anata wa, soshi suru mono o mita ka,
96|10|hitori no shimo be (muhanmado) ga, reihai o sasageru toki ni.
96|11|Anata wa, kare (soshi suru mono) ga,(tadashī michi) ni michibika rete iru to omou no ka.
96|12|Keishin o susumete iru ka,
96|13|(shinri o) usodearu to shite se o muketa to omou no ka.
96|14|Kare wa, arrā ga mite ora reru koto o shiranai no ka.
96|15|Danjite sōde wanai. Moshi kare ga tome nainaraba, ware wa maegami de kare o toraerudearou,
96|16|uso-tsuki de, tsumibukai maegami o.
96|17|Soshite kare no (kyūjo no tame ni) ichimi o shōshū sa se nasai.
96|18|Ware wa kanshu (no tenshi) o shōshū surudearou.
96|19|Danjite sō arubekide wanai. Anata wa kare ni shitagatte wa naranai. Ichizu ni sajida shite (omoni) chikadzuke. 〔Sajida〕
